title: The Body
description: Eleven strangers.The stoner, the dog walker, the redundancy victim, the lovers, the skinhead, the retired soldier and some incompetent smugglers.All with different reasons to be down at the waterside.All with different reasons to keep quiet about the one thing that connects them all...the body hanging from the tree.The Body: A novella about the seemingly mundane, secrecy and murder.
author: Daniel J. Pitcher
